languages.text: "Я знал, что вы поймете!" {n}Голос сержанта слегка дрожит. Подавая знак своим, сержант поворачивается к шаттлу, намереваясь взойти на его борт.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я знал, что вы поймете!" {n}Сержант Малгар отвечает чуть дрожащим голосом — кажется, он совсем не рассчитывал, что вы придете на подмогу. Подавая знак своим, сержант поворачивается к шаттлу, намереваясь взойти на его борт.{/n}

languages.text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я знал, что вы поймете!" {n}Голос сержанта слегка дрожит. Подавая знак своим, сержант поворачивается к шаттлу, намереваясь взойти на его борт.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle with the intention to board it.{/n}
"I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle with the intention to board it.{/n}
"I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}
"I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}
"I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}
"I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich wusste, Ihr würdet es verstehen!" {n}Die Stimme des Sergeants zittert leicht. Er gibt seinen Truppen ein Zeichen und dreht sich zum Shuttle um, um an Bord zu gehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, Ihr würdet es verstehen!" {n}Die Stimme des Sergeants zittert leicht. Er gibt seinen Truppen ein Zeichen und dreht sich zum Shuttle um, um an Bord zu gehen.{/n}

languages.text: « J'étais sûr que vous me comprendriez ! » {n}La voix du sergent tremble légèrement. Il fait un signe à ses troupes et se tourne vers la navette, prêt à embarquer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'étais sûr que vous me comprendriez ! » {n}La voix du sergent tremble légèrement. Il fait un signe à ses troupes et se tourne vers la navette, prêt à embarquer.{/n}

languages.text: “我就知道您能理解！”{n}军士的声音有些颤抖。他朝他的士兵做了个手势，转过了身，准备登上穿梭机。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我就知道您能理解！”{n}军士的声音有些颤抖。他朝他的士兵做了个手势，转过了身，准备登上穿梭机。{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたならわかってくださると思っていた！」{n}軍曹の声は微かに震えている。彼は部隊に合図を送るとシャトルに向き直り、乗り込もうとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたならわかってくださると思っていた！」{n}軍曹の声は微かに震えている。彼は部隊に合図を送るとシャトルに向き直り、乗り込もうとする。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Sabía que lo entendería!». {n}La voz del sargento tiembla ligeramente. Hace una señal a sus tropas y se vuelve hacia la lanzadera, a punto de subir a ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Sabía que lo entendería!». {n}La voz del sargento tiembla ligeramente. Hace una señal a sus tropas y se vuelve hacia la lanzadera, a punto de subir a ella.{/n}

languages.text: "Anlayacağınızı biliyordum!" {n}Çavuşun sesi hafifçe titriyor. Askerlerine işaret veriyor ve binmek üzere mekiğe yöneliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I knew you would understand!" {n}The sergeant's voice is trembling slightly. He signals his troops and turns to the shuttle, about to board it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anlayacağınızı biliyordum!" {n}Çavuşun sesi hafifçe titriyor. Askerlerine işaret veriyor ve binmek üzere mekiğe yöneliyor.{/n}
